title: WTF Is A Truman Show Presidency? Mcconaughey Speaks 10.12.21
itunes:title: WTF Is A Truman Show Presidency? Mcconaughey Speaks 10.12.21
description:
In episode 1006, Jack and Miles are joined by host of the Scoot Over podcast Aymann Ismail to discuss Not that many people willing to lose their jobs over being vaccinated, McConaughey SPEAKS, The Dumb Conspiracy Theory That Joe Biden Has a “Fake White House”, Bieber Fooled by Tom Cruise Deepfake, Is This Our Future?  and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Not that many people willing to lose their jobs over being vaccinated
  2. McConaughey SPEAKS
  3. The Dumb Conspiracy Theory That Joe Biden Has a “Fake White House”
  4. Bieber Fooled by Tom Cruise Deepfake, Is This Our Future?
  5. LISTEN: Boldy James - Double Hockey Sticks


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
